longBusinessSummary.0: MedPlus Health Services Limited engages in the retail trading of medicines and general items in India. It offers pharmaceutical and wellness products, including medicines, vitamins, medical devices, and test kits; fast-moving consumer goods, such as toiletries, baby care products, soaps, detergents, and sanitizers. The company also provides wholesale cash and carry, and pathological laboratory testing services, as well as engages in the contract manufacturing of private label pharmaceuticals. As of March 31, 2021, it operated through 1,659 stores located in the states of Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Telangana, and Andhra Pradesh, as well as through its online store. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
